description: Represents a collection of blog posts
title: MUN CS Society Blog Posts

___months.description: Contains a collection of months that blog posts were posted in

___month.description: The string representation of this month

___posts.description: A collection of the posts written in this month

___title.description: The title of this blog post

___author.description: The author of this blog post

___folder.description: The name of the folder under the blog folder that contains this post
